# Fuentes de datos {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| label: carga-paquetes
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(DT)
```

```{r}
#| label: definicion-fuentes-datos
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

datos <- data.frame(
  Orden = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
  Capa = c("Red vial", "Áreas Silvestres Protegidas", "Humedales", "Patrimonio Natural del Estado"),
  Tipo = c("Vectorial", "Vectorial", "Vectorial", "Vectorial"),
  Fuente = c("MOPT", "SINAC", "SINAC", "SINAC")
)
```

```{r}
#| label: despliegue-datos
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

datos |> 
  datatable(options = list(
    rownames = FALSE,
    pageLength = 5,
    language = list(url = '//cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/Spanish.json')
  ))
```
